data.name: Preset Message 1
data.message: “Sometimes You Must Hurt In Order To Know, Fall In Order To Grow, Lose In Order To Gain, Because Life’s Greatest Lessons Are Learned Through Pain.”

data.name: Preset Message 2
data.message: “Religion, Ideology, Resources, Land, Spite, Love Or Just Because. No Matter How Pathetic The Reason, It’s Enough To Start A War.”

data.name: Preset Message 3
data.message: “Just By Living, People Hurt Others Without Even Realizing It. So Long As Humanity Exists, Hate Will Also Exist. There Is No Peace In This Accursed World. War Is Just A Crime Paid For By The Pain Of The Defeated.”

data.name: Preset Message 4
data.message: “We Are Just Ordinary People Driven To Revenge In The Name Of Justice. But If Revenge Is Called Justice, Then That Justice Breeds Yet More Revenge And Becomes A Chain Of Hatred.”

data.name: Preset Message 5
data.message: “Love Breeds Sacrifice, Which In Turn Breeds Hatred. Then You Can Know Pain.”
